about_the_game: The Vol. 8 Premium Speed Pass* immediately grants the new, fully customizable Porsche 959 S ‘87 and opens up access to its 3 bodykits, alongside an additional 4 Rare Custom versions of the new cars arriving in this volume, including 2 original Speedhunters designs and an NFS Legends custom. You'll also gain access to unlocking sick, new customization options — including cop customization, like bumper guards and message bars, for the first time ever in Unbound. There’s a few goodies inside for the more street racer-minded opps, too. There are 30 total tiers of content to unlock in this premium track.
detailed_description: The Vol. 8 Premium Speed Pass* immediately grants the new, fully customizable Porsche 959 S ‘87 and opens up access to its 3 bodykits, alongside an additional 4 Rare Custom versions of the new cars arriving in this volume, including 2 original Speedhunters designs and an NFS Legends custom. You'll also gain access to unlocking sick, new customization options — including cop customization, like bumper guards and message bars, for the first time ever in Unbound. There’s a few goodies inside for the more street racer-minded opps, too. There are 30 total tiers of content to unlock in this premium track.
drm_notice: EA online activation and EA app software installation and background use required. Denuvo.
legal_notice: *Premium Speed Pass Content requires Premium Speed Pass and Need for Speed Unbound (sold separately) and all game updates. Requires gameplay to unlock. You must log in before the end of Volume 8 to claim your reward. Failure to log in and claim during this period will result in forfeiting the reward.
name: Need for Speed™ Unbound - Vol.8 Premium Speed Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600, Core i5-8600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 570, GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3600, Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX5700 (8GB), GeForce RTX 2070 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: The Vol. 8 Premium Speed Pass immediately grants the new Porsche 959 S ‘87, and opens access to its bodykits plus 4 Customs of the new Vol. 8 cars. You'll also gain access to sick, new customizations over 30 content tiers.
